divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and daughter and myself were out in our backyard celebrating the 4th of July when I looked up at some rockets going off and noticed this strange object in the sky first I thought it was a helicopter it was to low to be a plane, anyhow my wife also noticed it and asked me what it was well went off to the northwest at a very high rate of speed, it disappeared and reapeared along ways away , in the course of an hour we observed this 3 times. I looked at it with my binoculars and it was no aircraft or fireworks. It looked orange on top and yellow on the bottom.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Council Bluffs
There were no other sightings in Council Bluffs on or around July 4th 2013
Summary: Notice up in the sky very different.
